definition: to kill/to cause death/to do sb to death
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: For what make people be again harmed dead by the childe after producing good will to the some role?
sentences.chinese: 为啥总要让人对某角色产生了好感后再被公子害死？

sentences.english: But too much change will kill you too. You go from an ecocline to ecotone.
sentences.chinese: 但太多的变化也会把你害死。

sentences.english: A single hornet can kill 40 bees in a minute.
sentences.chinese: 一只大黄蜂在一分钟之内就能害死40只蜜蜂。

sentences.english: But I still didn't want to kill her.
sentences.chinese: 可是，我还是不想害死她。

sentences.english: Her desperate love had killed him.
sentences.chinese: 她不顾一切的爱害死了鸟儿。

sentences.english: You're killing settlers and taking their gold.
sentences.chinese: 你真害死定居者和带他们的金子。

sentences.english: Because is she the murderer that indirectly harms to dead pure son?
sentences.chinese: 是因为她是间接害死清儿的凶手？

sentences.english: Smoking kills. It is a sorrowful thing, but it also is a fact.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟害死人，这是个悲哀的事实。

sentences.english: The bird flu can kill many kinds of animals, including humans.
sentences.chinese: 禽流感能害死许多种类的动物，包括人类。

sentences.english: Avian flu has, after all, killed hundreds of humans in Asia and Africa.
sentences.chinese: 禽流感确实害死了亚非州数以百计的人。

sentences.english: Yesterday Tim Geithner, the US treasury secretary, left little doubt about the scale of the economic crisis.
sentences.chinese: 昨天美国财长盖特纳表害死经济危机越演越烈。

sentences.english: For anger slays the foolish man, And jealousy kills the simple.
sentences.chinese: 忿怒害死愚妄人，嫉妒杀死痴迷人。

sentences.english: For wrath killeth the foolish man, and envy slayeth the silly one.
sentences.chinese: 忿怒害死愚妄人，嫉妒杀死痴迷人。

sentences.english: But David said to Abishai, "Don't destroy him!
sentences.chinese: 大卫对亚比筛说，不可害死他。

sentences.english: It was my role in the film Curiosity Kills the Cat that unlocked the other side of me.
sentences.chinese: 是《好奇害死猫》这部片子让我发现了另一面的我。

definition: to conspire to murder/to plot against sb's life
to entrap/to set up/to frame (up)/to make false charges against
to kill secretly/to stab in the back
to entrap/to frame/to plant false evidence against sb
death cannot wipe out the crimes (idiom); dreadful crimes that rankled even after the perpetrator is dead
to kill sb to prevent them from divulging a secret/to silence sb
to impute/to shift the blame onto someone else
violent death (idiom); to die in a disaster/an unnatural death
